name: shiro
description: Browser-native Unix shell with Git, pipes, and IndexedDB filesystem - no servers, runs entirely in JavaScript

scripts.deploy: git submodule update --init --recursive && npm run build && cd dist && git init && git add -A && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push -f https://github.com/williamsharkey/shiro.git main:gh-pages && cd ..
